mapper.select: SELECT author FROM bibtex WHERE `group` = #{groupId} LIMIT 1000
SELECT author_id FROM author WHERE normalized_name = #{normalizedName} ORDER BY author_id DESC

select author.author_id, author.normalized_name, coauthor.normalized_name, coauthor.coauthorlist_id FROM author INNER JOIN coauthor_list USING(author_id) INNER JOIN coauthor ON (coauthor.coauthorlist_id = coauthor_list.coauthorlist_id) ORDER BY author.normalized_name ASC, author.author_id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO author(first_name, last_name, normalized_name) VALUES (#{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{normalizedName});
